title: Bug 24139Copy causes exception
description: Bug 24139Copy causes exception 0924 integration build.Happens on hpux, not on linux, haven't tried Aix orSolaris.
OB: open an editor on a .java file select some text, press CTRL+C to copy it instead get the attached exception
SR: open an editor on a .java file select some text, press CTRL+C to copy it instead get the attached exception
